description: Join our Young Archivists and local historian Lindsay Ould for a behind the scenes tour of Croydon Archives. Our Young Archivists will share their highlights from the collection and talk about their experiences as part of Croydon Archives' project to foreground young people's voices, reinterpret the collections and surface under-represented histories.

factsheet.heading: Tour Croydon Archives with our Young Archivists
paragraphs: Go behind the scenes at Croydon Archives to learn more about this fascinating collection and the stories within it.

Four of our Young Archivists will be leading the tours, supported by local historian Lindsay Ould. The Young Archivists have been involved in our Dynamic Collections project, funded by the National Lottery Heritage Fund, to foreground young people's voices, reinterpret our collections and surface under-represented histories. They will be sharing their highlights from the collection and talking about their experiences of being part of the project.
There will be an opportunity to ask questions and find out more about how we manage our collections.
Meeting point: Research Room, Croydon Clocktower

images.title: Join our Young Archivists and local historian Lindsay Ould for a  tour of Croydon Archives

travel_info:
Additional travel info: Only half an hour from London. 

Meet in the Research Room in Croydon Clocktower Complex

name: Croydon Archives - Behind the Scenes Tour
